p: We confirmed there was no relationship between rates of molecular evolution (SNP frequency) and either genetic distance from the host DCV was isolated from ( D. melanogaster) or estimated viral population size (see supplementary S1 and S2 Figs) using generalised linear mixed models that include the phylogeny as a random effect in the MCMCglmm package in R [ 63] as described previously [ 34]. We also examined the distribution of SNPs and whether they were synonymous or non-synonymous (see supplementary results).
